name: FindEntities

returns.name: list
returns.desc: Indexed table with handles to all entities with specified tag

examples: -- You may use this function in a similar way to other "Find functions" like FindBody, FindShape, FindVehicle, etc.
-- You can get all the entities of the specified type by passing an empty string to the tag
-- If the type is not specified, the search will be performed for all types
description: Returns a list of entities with the specified tag and type. This is a universal method that is an alternative to FindBody, FindShape, FindVehicle, etc.
